mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, email, login_type, created_at, updated_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE username = #{username}
SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, login_type, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{loginType}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, login_type = #{loginType}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
